info.title: DataLakeAnalyticsAccountManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Analytics account management client.

get.description: Gets the first page of Data Lake Analytics accounts, if any, within the current subscription. This includes a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Azure Data Lake Analytics accounts.

get.description: Gets the first page of Data Lake Analytics accounts, if any, within a specific resource group. This includes a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of accounts in the specified resource group.

put.description: Creates the specified Data Lake Analytics account. This supplies the user with computation services for Data Lake Analytics workloads.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create a new Data Lake Analytics account.

200.description: Successfully created the specified account.

201.description: Successfully initiated creation of the specified account.

get.description: Gets details of the specified Data Lake Analytics account.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the details of the specified account.

patch.description: Updates the Data Lake Analytics account object specified by the accountName with the contents of the account object.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the update Data Lake Analytics account operation.

200.description: Successfully updated the specified account.

201.description: Successfully initiated an update of the specified account.

202.description: Successfully initiated an update of the specified account.

delete.description: Begins the delete process for the Data Lake Analytics account object specified by the account name.

200.description: Successfully deleted the specified account.

202.description: Successfully initiated the deletion of the specified account.

204.description: The specified account was not found.

get.description: Gets the first page of Data Lake Store accounts linked to the specified Data Lake Analytics account. The response includes a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Data Lake Store accounts.

put.description: Updates the specified Data Lake Analytics account to include the additional Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: dataLakeStoreAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account to add.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The details of the Data Lake Store account.

200.description: Successfully added the specified Azure Data Lake Store account information.

get.description: Gets the specified Data Lake Store account details in the specified Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: dataLakeStoreAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account to retrieve

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified Azure Data Lake Store account information.

delete.description: Updates the Data Lake Analytics account specified to remove the specified Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: dataLakeStoreAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account to remove

200.description: Successfully removed the specified Azure Data Lake Store account information from the specified Azure Data Lake Analytics account.

get.description: Gets the first page of Azure Storage accounts, if any, linked to the specified Data Lake Analytics account. The response includes a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Azure Storage accounts.

put.description: Updates the specified Data Lake Analytics account to add an Azure Storage account.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Storage account to add

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters containing the access key and optional suffix for the Azure Storage Account.

200.description: Successfully added the specified Azure Storage account information to the specified Azure Data Lake Analytics account.

get.description: Gets the specified Azure Storage account linked to the given Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Storage account for which to retrieve the details.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified Azure Storage account information.

patch.description: Updates the Data Lake Analytics account to replace Azure Storage blob account details, such as the access key and/or suffix.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The Azure Storage account to modify

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters containing the access key and suffix to update the storage account with, if any. Passing nothing results in no change.

200.description: Successfully update the specified Azure Storage account information for the specified Azure Data Lake Analytics account.

delete.description: Updates the specified Data Lake Analytics account to remove an Azure Storage account.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Storage account to remove

200.description: Successfully deleted the specified Azure Storage account information from the Azure Data Lake Analytics account.

get.description: Lists the Azure Storage containers, if any, associated with the specified Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage account combination. The response includes a link to the next page of results, if any.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure storage account from which to list blob containers.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Azure Storage containers under the specified Azure Data Lake Analytics account.

410.description: The resource referred by the Storage account  is gone.

get.description: Gets the specified Azure Storage container associated with the given Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage accounts.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure storage account from which to retrieve the blob container.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure storage container to retrieve

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified Azure Storage container information.

post.description: Gets the SAS token associated with the specified Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage account and container combination.

parameters.name: storageAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure storage account for which the SAS token is being requested.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure storage container for which the SAS token is being requested.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Storage Account SAS tokens for the specified Azure Storage account container.

get.description: Lists the Data Lake Analytics compute policies within the specified Data Lake Analytics account. An account supports, at most, 50 policies

200.description: Successfully listed the compute policies.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified compute policy. During update, the compute policy with the specified name will be replaced with this new compute policy. An account supports, at most, 50 policies

parameters.name: computePolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the compute policy to create or update.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update the compute policy. The max degree of parallelism per job property, min priority per job property, or both must be present.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the specified compute policy

get.description: Gets the specified Data Lake Analytics compute policy.

parameters.name: computePolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the compute policy to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified compute policy.

parameters.name: computePolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the compute policy to update.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update the compute policy.

200.description: Successfully updated the specified compute policy

delete.description: Deletes the specified compute policy from the specified Data Lake Analytics account

parameters.name: computePolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the compute policy to delete.

200.description: Successfully deleted the specified compute policy

204.description: The specified compute policy does not exist or was already deleted.

get.description: Lists the Data Lake Analytics firewall rules within the specified Data Lake Analytics account.

200.description: Successfully listed the firewall rules.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified firewall rule. During update, the firewall rule with the specified name will be replaced with this new firewall rule.

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule to create or update.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update the firewall rule.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the specified firewall rule

get.description: Gets the specified Data Lake Analytics firewall rule.

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified firewall rule.

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule to update.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update the firewall rule.

200.description: Successfully updated the specified firewall rule

delete.description: Deletes the specified firewall rule from the specified Data Lake Analytics account

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule to delete.

200.description: Successfully deleted the specified firewall rule

204.description: The specified firewall rule does not exist or was already deleted.

get.description: Lists all of the available Data Lake Analytics REST API operations.

200.description: Successfully listed the available operations for Data Lake Analytics.

get.description: Gets subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Analytics specified by resource location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The resource location without whitespace.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Analytics specified by resource location.

post.description: Checks whether the specified account name is available or taken.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The resource location without whitespace.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to check the Data Lake Analytics account name availability.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the Data Lake Analytics account name availability information.

SubResource.description: The resource model definition for a nested resource.

properties.description: The properties defined by Data Lake Analytics all properties are specific to each resource provider.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccount.description: A Data Lake Analytics account object, containing all information associated with the named Data Lake Analytics account.

properties.description: The properties defined by Data Lake Analytics all properties are specific to each resource provider.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountBasic.description: A Data Lake Analytics account object, containing all information associated with the named Data Lake Analytics account.

defaultDataLakeStoreAccount.description: The default Data Lake Store account associated with this account.

dataLakeStoreAccounts.description: The list of Data Lake Store accounts associated with this account.

storageAccounts.description: The list of Azure Blob Storage accounts associated with this account.

computePolicies.description: The list of compute policies associated with this account.

hiveMetastores.description: The list of hiveMetastores associated with this account.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtualNetwork rules associated with this account.

firewallRules.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this account.

firewallState.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this account.

firewallAllowAzureIps.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

newTier.description: The commitment tier for the next month.

currentTier.description: The commitment tier in use for the current month.

maxJobCount.description: The maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time.

systemMaxJobCount.description: The system defined maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time, which restricts the maximum number of running jobs the user can set for the account.

maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account.

systemMaxDegreeOfParallelism.description: The system defined maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account, which restricts the maximum value of parallelism the user can set for the account.

maxDegreeOfParallelismPerJob.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism per job for this account.

minPriorityPerJob.description: The minimum supported priority per job for this account.

queryStoreRetention.description: The number of days that job metadata is retained.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountProperties.description: The account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account. Returned only when retrieving a specific account.

accountId.description: The unique identifier associated with this Data Lake Analytics account.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the Data Lake Analytics account.

state.description: The state of the Data Lake Analytics account.

endpoint.description: The full CName endpoint for this account.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountPropertiesBasic.description: The basic account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountListResult.description: Data Lake Analytics account list information.

properties.description: The Data Lake Store account properties.

suffix.description: The optional suffix for the Data Lake Store account.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

DataLakeStoreAccountInformationListResul.description: Data Lake Store account list information.

suffix.description: The optional suffix for the storage account.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

properties.description: The properties of the blob container.

lastModifiedTime.description: The last modified time of the blob container.

StorageContainerProperties.description: Azure Storage blob container properties information.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

StorageContainerListResult.description: The list of blob containers associated with the storage account attached to the Data Lake Analytics account.

accessToken.description: The access token for the associated Azure Storage Container.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

SasTokenInformationListResult.description: The SAS response that contains the storage account, container and associated SAS token for connection use.

properties.description: The compute policy properties.

objectId.description: The AAD object identifier for the entity to create a policy for.

objectType.description: The type of AAD object the object identifier refers to.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

properties.description: The firewall rule properties.

FirewallRule.description: Data Lake Analytics firewall rule information.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

name.description: The Data Lake Analytics name to check availability for.

AccountNameParameter.name: accountName
AccountNameParameter.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.
